content.question: The writer wants to do research to find additional sources that support the writer’s main argument. All of the following are likely to be reliable research sources EXCEPT

choices.label: an excerpt from a novel by James Joyce that uses the stream-of-consciousness style
a blog post ranking the blogger’s five favorite modernist novels
an entry on modernism in a well-known encyclopedia
an essay about the First World War in a literary reference book

content.answer: a blog post ranking the blogger’s five favorite modernist novels

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Develop paragraphs comprised of a claim and evidence that supports the claim.
